content: SEO General SEOKeyword ResearchOn-Page SEOLink BuildingTechnical SEOLocal SEOEnterprise SEO Marketing General MarketingContent MarketingAffiliate MarketingPaid MarketingVideo Marketing Data & Studies Product Guides SEOKeyword ResearchOn-Page SEOLink BuildingTechnical SEOLocal SEO Search Search Subscribe Menu Search SEO General SEO Keyword Research On-Page SEO Link Building Technical SEO Local SEO Enterprise SEO Marketing General Marketing Content Marketing Affiliate Marketing Paid Marketing Video Marketing Data & Studies Product Guides SEO Keyword Research On-Page SEO Link Building Technical SEO Local SEO Subscribe AuthorsEn Ci YapContent editor at AhrefsEn Ci Yap is the content editor at Ahrefs.In 2016, she started her editorial journey as an intern at the Australian Broadcasting Corporation. Since then, she has created and vetted content for publications large and small.Before Ahrefs, En was a proofreader and ghostwriter. She focused on concision writing, helping tech and finance companies simplify complex topics for their readers.En is a journo at heart and holds a Bachelor of Journalism from The University of Queensland.
